column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This was probably only the second real art museum I've ever gotten to go to
column2: but I absolutely loved it! This place is huge and full of such a huge variety of pieces! I tend to lean more towards the older art styles
column3: but they have tons of modern stuff too. Â I could totally undertsand someone needing an entire day (or couple of days) to really see everything they want to see here. Admission is a little on the expensive side
column4: but they offer a lot of deals (discounts for Illinois and Chicago Residents
column5: and the CityPass for those visiting who will also be going to other big attractions).
